author: View All Posts Okogba
title: Rape rampant in Amukoko, Lagos, residents cry out - Vanguard News
text:
Home » News » Rape rampant in Amukoko, Lagos, residents cry out Rape rampant in Amukoko, Lagos, residents cry out On 9:58 pm In News by Okogba Comments 
LANDLORDS in Amukoko in Ifelodun Local Government Area of Lagos State have called on Lagos State Police Command to save them from hoodlums. 
They noted the incessant clash between youths of Mosaje and Apasa, adding that lives and property were being threatened. 
In addition, they said the hoodlums often rape, steal and destroy property. 
A resident, who said he witnessed a recent incident, Alhaji A Sodiq, said the Police Division in the area and the Baale of the community were aware of the incident. Okogba
